title: Campground Accessibility
description: Note: This file is a WIP, certain things have not been implemented yet, for example validation on many of the fields and required attributes

numberOfAccessibleCampsites.description: How many campsites are accessible? Based on United States Access Board standards (May 2014)

openingLength.description: Measure opening between barriers (inches and decimal, ex. .125)

onPerimeter.description: Are there barriers alongside the perimeter of the unit
